def maximize_art_exhibition_value(N, art_works):
    art_works.sort()
    su = 1
    S = -art_works[0][0]
    ans = -10 ** 19
    for (a, b) in art_works:
        S = min(S, su - a)
        ans = max(ans, su + b - a - S)
        su += b
    return ans

def maximize_art_exhibition_value(N, art_works):
    art_works.sort()
    su = 0
    S = -art_works[0][0]
    ans = -10 ** 19
    for (a, b) in art_works:
        S = min(S, su - a)
        ans = max(ans, su * b - a - S)
        su += b
    return ans
